summary: This document consists of two emails between FBI agents discussing therapy referrals for an Epstein victim residing in Brevard County, Florida. The emails coordinate resources and mention a prior meeting with the victim in October, as well as a request for therapy expense funding through EVAF.

persons.name: Epstein Victim
persons.context: An unnamed victim of Jeffrey Epstein, residing in Brevard County, Florida, who reached out to an FBI agent for therapy referrals and had previously met with agents in October.

events.title: Therapy referral coordination for Epstein victim
events.description: FBI agents exchange emails to coordinate therapy referrals for an Epstein victim in Brevard County, Florida, including a list of local mental health resources.

events.title: Prior meeting with Epstein victim
events.description: An FBI agent mentions a previous meeting with the Epstein victim in October, indicating ongoing victim support and investigation follow-up.

keyFacts: FBI agents are actively coordinating therapy referrals for an Epstein victim in Brevard County, Florida, as of June 2020.
The victim had previously met with FBI agents in October, indicating ongoing engagement with law enforcement.
A request for therapy expenses was made through EVAF (Epstein Victims' Assistance Fund or similar program).
Multiple local mental health service providers in Brevard County are listed, some offering telehealth services.
The correspondence shows continued victim support efforts by the FBI years after Epstein's arrest and death.
